title: Peace
empathy: I can hear how heavy this season has been for you; it's okay to feel anxious.
scripture: Philippians 4:6 - Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God.
wisdom: Trust that God walks with you step by step; practical steps bring spiritual peace.
action: Write down three small, concrete tasks you can do this week to prepare for the new job.
prayer: Lord, give us courage and calm as we step into new beginnings. Amen.
